getting_to_know.en: Do you like yourself?
getting_to_know.zh: 你喜欢自己吗？

getting_to_know.en: Are you satisfied with your own appearance?
getting_to_know.zh: 你对自己的容貌满意吗？？

getting_to_know.en: What are the must-have essentials when you go out?
getting_to_know.zh: 你出门时必备的物品有哪些？

getting_to_know.en: What are your social boundaries?
getting_to_know.zh: 你的社交界限有哪些？

getting_to_know.en: Are you someone who will actively seek help?
getting_to_know.zh: 你是会主动寻求帮助的人吗？

getting_to_know.en: Do you think you are real and honest?
getting_to_know.zh: 你觉得自己是一个真实的人吗？？

getting_to_know.en: Tell us three things you feel grateful for.
getting_to_know.zh: 说出你生命中值得感恩的三件事情。

getting_to_know.en: What kind of people do you hold bias to?
getting_to_know.zh: 你对哪类人会有潜意识的偏见？

getting_to_know.en: When will you feel embarrassed?
getting_to_know.zh: 什么场景会让你感到尴尬？

getting_to_know.en: Is there any difference between how you view yourself and how others view you?
getting_to_know.zh: 别人眼中的你，和你眼中的自己有区别吗？

getting_to_know.en: Tell us five merits of yours. (You surely do have them!)
getting_to_know.zh: 说出自己的五个优点。（你一定有的！）

getting_to_know.en: Do you have any hidden burden deep inside?
getting_to_know.zh: 你心中有隐藏的重担吗？

getting_to_know.en: When people praise you, what would you like to hear?
getting_to_know.zh: 你最喜欢别人夸奖你什么？

getting_to_know.en: What irritates you?
getting_to_know.zh: 什么事情会让你感到很生气？

getting_to_know.en: How would you rank love, career, hobbies, family?
getting_to_know.zh: 你会怎么排序爱情，事业，爱好，家人？

getting_to_know.en: What moment makes you feel your life is bright?
getting_to_know.zh: 什么时候会让你感觉生活充满光亮？

getting_to_know.en: Speak out your three shortcomings bravely.
getting_to_know.zh: 你能勇敢地说出自己三个缺点吗？

getting_to_know.en: What role do you play in a group?
getting_to_know.zh: 你觉得你在人群中是什么角色？

getting_to_know.en: Do you act differently with people than alone?
getting_to_know.zh: 在人群中的你和私底下的你一样吗？

getting_to_know.en: What are the characteristics of the people you admire?
getting_to_know.zh: 你欣赏的人普遍有什么特点呢？

ideals_reals.en: What is your most ideal, comfortable day like?
ideals_reals.zh: 你觉得最舒服的一天应该是怎么样的？
你为什么会来到这里上学/工作？

ideals_reals.en: Do you like your area of studies?
If you can choose to live in another city, where would you want to go?
ideals_reals.zh: 如果不在现在的城市居住，你想去哪里？
你近期的小目标是什么？

ideals_reals.en: What do you plan to study recently?
ideals_reals.zh: 你最近有打算学些什么呢？

ideals_reals.en: What is it like when you are 70 years old?
ideals_reals.zh: 你70岁的时会是怎么样的？

ideals_reals.en: What would you do if you have unlimited money?
ideals_reals.zh: 如果你有花不完的钱，你会做什么？

ideals_reals.en: Where and how would you like to be when you die?
ideals_reals.zh: 你希望自己离世的时候是什么场景？

heart_to_heart.en: Describe the person on your right with three words.
heart_to_heart.zh: 用三个词形容你右边的人。

heart_to_heart.en: Of those who have passed away, whom do you miss? What would you like to say to them?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你最想念哪位过世的人？如果还能见到他/她，会想说什么？

heart_to_heart.en: Between you and your (future) partner, whom can you accept to die first?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你和你的（未来）伴侣，你能接受谁先去世？

heart_to_heart.en: What is the impact of your family of origin on you?
heart_to_heart.zh: 原生家庭对你的影响有哪些？

heart_to_heart.en: Whom do you feel grateful to the most?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你最想感激的对象是谁？

heart_to_heart.en: Are you the proactive one in a relationship? Why?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你在一段感情中是主动的一方吗？为什么？

heart_to_heart.en: What is your biggest fear/insecurity in a relationship?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你在一段感情中最大的恐惧是什么？

heart_to_heart.en: What is your father like?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你的父亲是怎样的人？

heart_to_heart.en: What is the most important thing you have learned from past relationships?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你从过去的感情中学到了什么最重要的事？

heart_to_heart.en: How do you handle conflicts in a relationship?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你如何处理感情中的冲突？

heart_to_heart.en: What is your mother like?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你的母亲是怎样的人？

heart_to_heart.en: Do you have siblings? How does it make who you are?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你有兄弟姐妹吗？这对你有什么影响？

heart_to_heart.en: Whom do you love the most?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你最爱的人是谁？

heart_to_heart.en: What behaviors do you dislike among friends?
heart_to_heart.zh: 朋友之间，什么行为会让你反感？

heart_to_heart.en: Do you have anyone that you owe an apology to? What do you want to say to him/her?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你有对不起的人吗？想对他/她说什么？

heart_to_heart.en: What is the most important value you look for in a friend?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你在朋友身上最看重的特质是什么？

heart_to_heart.en: How would you order the following five love languages: Words of affirmation, Quality time, Receiving gifts, Physical touch, Acts of service?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你会怎么排序以下五种爱的语言：赞美鼓励，高质量的陪伴，礼物，肢体接触，实际行动上的帮助？

heart_to_heart.en: What is the best advice you have ever received about relationships?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你收到过的关于感情的最好建议是什么？

heart_to_heart.en: How do you show love to others?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你通常如何向别人表达爱意？

heart_to_heart.en: What is your biggest relationship deal-breaker?
heart_to_heart.zh: 在感情中，什么是你无法接受的底线？

heart_to_heart.en: Can you live with long-distance relationship?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你能接受异地恋吗？

memories.en: What is the most memorable memory that has shaped who you are?
memories.zh: 哪个记忆最深刻地塑造了现在的你？

memories.en: Can you rate your childhood out of 10?
memories.zh: 你会给你的童年打几分（满分10分）？

memories.en: What childhood moment made you grateful to God?
memories.zh: 哪个童年时刻让你对神充满感恩？

memories.en: What is your favorite tv show as a child?
memories.zh: 你小时候最喜欢的电视节目是什么？

memories.en: Describe your favorite trip.
memories.zh: 你最喜欢的旅行是哪一次呢？

memories.en: Describe something that has made you feel ashamed.
memories.zh: 描述一件让你感到羞愧的事情吧。

memories.en: What is your happiest memory?
memories.zh: 你最开心的记忆是什么？

memories.en: What is your most adventurous experience?
memories.zh: 你最冒险的经历是什么？

memories.en: Describe something that made you feel most regretful.
memories.zh: 描述一件你最后悔的事情吧。

memories.en: When was the last time you cried and why?
memories.zh: 你最近一次哭是什么时候，因为什么事情？

memories.en: What is the best thing you have ever done?
memories.zh: 你做过最棒的一件事是什么？

memories.en: Describe your most memorable experience.
memories.zh: 你最忘不掉的经历是什么？

memories.en: If you can reset for just one thing, what do you hope to change?
memories.zh: 如果有一件事可以重来，你最想要改变什么？？

memories.en: What had made your week?
memories.zh: 这个星期有什么令你开心的事情？

memories.en: What is the happiest moment for you so far?
memories.zh: 迄今为止，你最幸福的时刻是什么？

memories.en: What is the most spontaneous thing you have ever done?
memories.zh: 你做过最冲动的事情是什么？

memories.en: What is your favorite family tradition?
memories.zh: 你最喜欢的家庭传统是什么？

memories.en: Describe a time when you overcame a significant challenge.
memories.zh: 描述一个你克服重大挑战的时刻吧。

memories.en: What is the most rebellious experience you have ever had
memories.zh: 你做过最叛逆的事情是什么？

memories.en: What is your most treasured memory?
memories.zh: 你最珍惜的记忆是什么？

matters_of_soul.en: When you feel down, how do you want brothers and sisters to help you?
matters_of_soul.zh: 当你感到沮丧时，你希望弟兄姐妹如何帮助你？

matters_of_soul.en: If your partner chooses to commit his/her full life to God in service, how would you respond?
matters_of_soul.zh: 如果你的伴侣选择将他/她的一生奉献给神，你会有何反应？

matters_of_soul.en: What doubt has strengthened your faith?
matters_of_soul.zh: 什么疑惑反而加深了你的信仰？

matters_of_soul.en: What does true Christian friendship mean to you?
matters_of_soul.zh: 真正的基督徒友谊对你意味着什么？

matters_of_soul.en: How has God used community to heal you?
matters_of_soul.zh: 神如何使用团契来医治你？

matters_of_soul.en: How would you describe God in one word and why?
matters_of_soul.zh: 如果要用一个词来形容神，你会用什么词汇？为什么？

matters_of_soul.en: What Bible verse has changed your life?
matters_of_soul.zh: 哪节经文对你影响最大？

matters_of_soul.en: What miracle have you witnessed or experienced?
matters_of_soul.zh: 你见证或经历过什么神迹？

matters_of_soul.en: What kind of person do you think can go to heaven?
matters_of_soul.zh: 你认为什么样的人可以去天堂？

matters_of_soul.en: Are you willing to live forever?
What is freedom like to you?
matters_of_soul.zh: 你心中的自由是什么样子的？

matters_of_soul.en: What would you say to God if He stands in front of you?
matters_of_soul.zh: 如果上帝站在你面前，你会对祂说什么？

matters_of_soul.en: What would you ask God if you have one question to ask Him?
matters_of_soul.zh: 如果你可以问上帝一个问题，你会问什么问题？

matters_of_soul.en: Do you believe in divine power? Why?
What provides you your spiritual support?
Life is short. If we are meant to vanish someday, why should we live this life?
matters_of_soul.zh: 既然人生注定是短暂的，你为什么还要活这一生？

matters_of_soul.en: How has your faith been challenged and how did you overcome it?
matters_of_soul.zh: 你的信仰经历过哪些挑战，你是如何克服的？
